entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 45 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
